body:
Thanks for following up. I was curious if there was something about the
name `p4` being that it is the same as the perforce cli util

On Tue, Dec 16, 2014 at 5:39 PM, Alasdair Forsythe <notifications@github.com
> wrote:
>
> Resolution was that I'd installed Go 1.4 incorrectly. Sorry for the waste
> of time.
